title: Cannot Reinstall a Gmail Account "Unable to Log in at Server"
creator: barbnjohn
content: Several days ago we inadvertently deleted batches of emails from our two Thunderbird Gmail accounts on our PC and Apple devices. The lost emails were duly recovered but only after having to change my Google password. However one of our Thunderbird Gmail account will not download any new messages coming in. Ultimately we deleted that account from Thunderbird, intending to reinstall it. We deleted the account by pressing the Red button in account settings. We confirmed that messages are received to Gmail's Web page Inbox Now when I attempt to reinstall the account and press Add Account, I get the UNABLE TO LOG IN AT SERVER MESSAGE shown below. The "Your Full Name" I am putting in is the name on the Google account deleted from Thunderbird, and the password I have tried is my new Google password. I have tried the process of not adding in the password until requested to do so but this did not work either. Any suggestions please?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/143.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

title: Setting everything comptely on a different drive, including C:\Users\<user>\AppData
creator: JJM
content:
Is there anyway of completely installing Thunberbird on a different drive and not have any stuff including symlinks in the users home directory?

Installing Thunderbird on a different drive/location is documented and straight forward but it insists on putting stuff in the users home directory C:\Users\<user>\AppData\ .

The problem can be fixed by using copying everything Thunderbird related in the C:\Users\<user>\AppData\ to the other drive and use symlinks from C:\Users\<user>\AppData\ directory to its new location. Thunderbird seems to be ok with symlinks.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;ff_version:147.0;os:Windows 10

title: I can receive but cannot send emails
creator: osborne13
content: Hello, I've been happily using Thunderbird for a few years now. Since yesterday, I have been unable to send emails in Thunderbird, but I can receive them. I can send emails directly through my Skymesh Webmail, but in Thunderbird when I try to send an email, I get the following notification, even if I am sending it to only one recipient. Sending of the message failed. The message was not sent due to exceeding the allowed number of recipients. The server responded: Insufficient system storage. Please help. Regards, Judy Osborne 15th January 2026 osborne1@bordernet.com.au
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/143.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;solver_id:7334934

title: Best method to Convert MBOX to PST
creator: giririshi2005
content: If you’re looking for a reliable way to move your emails into Outlook, the DRS Softech MBOX to PST Converter Tool is widely considered a top-tier professional solution. It is specifically built to bridge the gap between email clients like Thunderbird, Apple Mail, and the Microsoft Outlook environment by converting MBOX files into PST format. This Tool is a powerful utility designed to ensure your migrated mailbox is clean and organized. By comparing specific data points, the tool identifies and excludes redundant emails, saving you storage space.

title: Dopo aver cambiato la password di Yahoo in Thunderbird non mi fa entrare piu'
creator: robertosconocchini
content: 2 giorni fa ho cambiato la password di Yahoo. Ho proceduto in Thunderbird ad aggiornare le password ma ora non mi fa accedere piu. Ogni volta mi appare la finsetra in cui devo inserire nome utente e password e quando lo faccio mi appare la finestra con "Si è verificato un errore...". Come risolvere?

title: Only the donation page is accessable; I CAN'T READ ANY OF MY E-MAIL
creator: mail225
content: It's fine that you try to raise funds for Thunderbird. But at least make sure that I can always, always! read my e-mail! Right at the start of my working day I only have acces to the donation page!

title: https://addons.thunderbird.net gives error 502 Bad Gateway
